head.title: Lisa Michaelis and Billy Schlosser, Musicians, Wed

hedline.hl1: Lisa Michaelis and Billy Schlosser, Musicians, Wed

block.p: LEAD: Lisa Cecile Michaelis was married yesterday to William Coxe Schlosser at the Mark Hotel in New York by the Rev. Lisa Ward, a Unitarian minister. The bride is the daughter of Marianne Zelnicker of Mobile, Ala., and Arnold Michaelis of New York. Mr. Schlosser is a son of Leonard B. Schlosser and Mary Coxe Schlosser, both of New

LEAD: Lisa Cecile Michaelis was married yesterday to William Coxe Schlosser at the Mark Hotel in New York by the Rev. Lisa Ward, a Unitarian minister. The bride is the daughter of Marianne Zelnicker of Mobile, Ala., and Arnold Michaelis of New York. Mr. Schlosser is a son of Leonard B. Schlosser and Mary Coxe Schlosser, both of New

Lisa Cecile Michaelis was married yesterday to William Coxe Schlosser at the Mark Hotel in New York by the Rev. Lisa Ward, a Unitarian minister. The bride is the daughter of Marianne Zelnicker of Mobile, Ala., and Arnold Michaelis of New York. Mr. Schlosser is a son of Leonard B. Schlosser and Mary Coxe Schlosser, both of New York.

The bride, a singer, pianist and actress who will keep her name, and her husband, a drummer, compose and perform together under the name Billy and Lisa. The bride attended the Dalton School and the Diller-Quaile School of Music. Her father is a television producer.

The bridegroom graduated from St. Paul's School in Concord, N.H., and attended Vassar College and the Berkeley School of Music. His father, who is retired, was chairman of the Lindenmeyr Paper Corporation in New York.
